message: Hi Bob! I have a fantastic product that I believe will greatly benefit you. I'm offering it for $15,000. I think itâ€™s worth every penny, and I'm excited to hear your thoughts!
Hi Cherita, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the value you see in this product, $15000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it. Let me know what you think.
